title: Be Woke Or Go to Sleep ( Dr. Umar Johnson interview)
itunes:title: Be Woke Or Go to Sleep ( Dr. Umar Johnson interview)
description:
Today on the show we had someone that may be similar to coffee that will definitely wake your ass up cause he is definitely "Woke" and that is Dr. Umar Johnson. He spoke about police brutality, interracial. dating and black education. During the interivew, the phone lines were lighting up so we opened up the phone lines to hear our listeners thought on the interview. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to another Floridian for biting off a chunk of skin from an Uber driver.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
